sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"服从，听从"之意。
means: obey ： 一般用词，指服从或接受某种权威，或遵循某种原则而行事。
comply ： 指同意依从他人的愿望或请求，或遵守某种规则或顺应某种环境条件。
submit ： 指顺从或屈服于自己不能进一步抵制或抵抗的人或事物。

sentence.Network_en: Clifford's only stipulation is that his clients obey his advice.
sentence.Network_cn: 克利福德唯一的要求就是客户必须听从他的建议。

sentence.Network_en: They obey the one unwritten rule that binds them all—no talking.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们都遵守着那条约束他们所有人的默认规则——要守口如瓶。

sentence.Network_en: He threatened to disinherit her if she refused to obey.
sentence.Network_cn: 他威胁说如果她拒绝服从就剥夺她的继承权。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... newsletter 时报 obey 服从 in the way 在路上.
许国璋英语(第一册)单词表 - 豆丁网 ... mustn't mod. & v. 切勿 obey vt. 服从，遵守 floor n. 地板.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... behavior n 行为；举止；习性 obey vt 服从；顺从 stay in touch with 与...保持联络.
字典中惟字的解释 ... (5) 有[ have] (6) 听从,随从[ obey] (8) 愿,希望[ hope].

list.abs: We must obey traffic regulations , I can ' t disobey ., 我们必须遵守交通规则 , 我不能违抗.

some technologies do indeed improve at such a predictable pace that they obey simple formulae such as Moore's law , which acts as a battle plan for the semiconductor industry .的确，有些技术的进步是以一种可预测的节奏进行着，他们遵循摩尔定律般简单的公式，好比是半导体工业的设计图纸。
You ought to obey your parents ., 你应服从你的父母.
I will hasten and not delay to obey your commands ., 60 我急忙遵守你的命令 , 并不迟延.
you must obey the traffic rules ., 你必须遵守交通规则.
virtual economy must obey and serve real economy ., 虚拟经济必须服从和服务于实体经济.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French obeir, from Latin oboedire, from ob- 'in the direction of' + audire 'hear'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 obey英音：[ə'bei]美音：[ə'be] obey的中文翻译及物动词 vt. 1. 服从；听从；执行；遵守 You didn't obey the manager's instructions. 你没有执行经理的指示。 Obey your boss or you will be fired. 服从你的上司，否则你会被解雇。 2. 按照。..行动 不及物动词 vi. 1. 服从；听话 The child obeyed and went to bed. 孩子听话睡觉去了。以下结果来自互联网网络释义 1. 服从，遵奉，顺从 托福考试指导：

entry.def: If you obey a person, a command, or an instruction, you do what you are told to do.

example.ex: Cissie obeyed her mother without question...
example.tran: 茜茜对她母亲言听计从。

auth_sentence.content: Isn't it terrible how readily they will obey?
auth_sentence.res_content: Isn't it terrible how readily they will obey?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isn't it terrible how readily they will obey?

auth_sentence.content: It is fit that the yonger obey the elder.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is fit that the yonger obey the elder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is fit that the yonger obey the elder.

auth_sentence.content: So what form of democracy will these robots obey?
auth_sentence.res_content: So what form of democracy will these robots obey?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So what form of democracy will these robots obey?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不适于食用的, 不能吃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+edible[adj.可食用的]→adj.不适于食用的, 不能吃的
obey[v.服从, 顺从]+ience=ence状态→obedience服众, 顺从

stems_affixes.value_cn: 贪吃, 狼吞虎咽, 贪婪
stems_affixes.word_buile: ed吃+acity表名词→n.贪吃, 狼吞虎咽, 贪婪

Sentence.sentence: He said "Monsanto should not be able, just because they've got billions of dollars to spend on legal fees, to try to terrify farmers into obeying their agreements by massive force and threats.

sentences.en: All I had to do now was to obey him in silence.
sentences.cn: 这时, 我要做的只是默默地服从他。

jushi.english: She obeyed and cautiously opened the door.
jushi.chinese: 她服从了,并小心地开了门。
